entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-10-19
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • hostfxr and other native libraries copied to output when old NETCore.App package is referenced #77236
  • IDBFS NOT FOUND ISSUE again #77235
  • [release/3.1] CI Failure: System.Diagnostics.EventLog #77234
  • [release/3.1] CI failure: System.IO.Tests.DirectoryInfo_Create.PathWithReservedDeviceNameAsPath_ThrowsDirectoryNotFoundException #77233
  • FTP Downloading Randomly Missing Bytes in .NET 6.0 #77232
  • Implement the logic to support SoftwareWriteWatch in NativeAOT #77225
  • Created the published AppBundle for a WebAssembly Browser App in the publish folder #77222
    8.0.0
  • arm64 linux runtime SIGSEGVs on console helloworld #77217
  • `QuicStream.ReadsClosed` doesn't always complete on connection disposal #77216
    8.0.0
  • PR Benchmarks Improvements #77215
    Future
  • PriorityQueue<TElement, TPriority> edge case Count out of sync #77212
    8.0.0
  • LoggerFactory class registration is singleton create performance issue for manuel resolve #77210
  • [API Proposal]: Add structural equality and order comparison for common collections #77209
    8.0.0
  • [NETSDKE2E] With .NET 7.0.100 GA installed, the CoreCLR symbols are missing for IL symbols #77207
  • [Suggestion] Introduce more easy-to-use ways to work with grapheme clusters #77200
    Future
  • Immutable base type #77195
  • Smooth out support for running .NET from JS via WebAssembly #77191
    8.0.0

Closed

  • Clean-up VN for promoted fields assigned using the whole parent. #41242
    8.0.0
  • Propose, API change: DispatchProxy instantiation #16614
    Future
  • Microsoft.Windows.Compatibility 6.0.0 cause CVE-2022-34716 issue #76604
    6.0.x
  • The 3.1 and 5.0 SDKs do not support musl/Alpine Linux anymore #76338
  • Test failure: JIT\\Regression\\JitBlue\\GitHub_23159\\GitHub_23159\\GitHub_23159.cmd #76880
    8.0.0
  • Lack of CS0165 (Use of unassigned local variable) for DateOnly and TimeOnly types #77177
  • build-android-rootfs.sh Must be fix the "termux" URL #76002
    Future
  • Is it correct to allow abstract methods to be created in the abstract class? #77199
  • Test failure: JIT/opt/Cloning/Runtime_61040_5/Runtime_61040_5.sh #76855
    8.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Include dependently promoted fields in SSA #77238
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Don't invoke EnsureInstructionSetFlagsAreValid all the time in JIT #77237
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix a signed/unsigned comparison warning #77230
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Fix reported PriorityQueue issue. #77229
    area-System.Collections, 8.0.0
  • Remove more swprintf_s uses #77228
    area-VM-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Fix comment #77226
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Clearing all cards for free regions #77224
    area-GC-coreclr
  • System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapConnection: allow non-ASCII Passwords on Linux Systems #77223
  • [mono][interp] Don't use mov.vt when storing into primitive type fields #77221
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • [Android] PoC: Use Java TrustManager to call RemoteCertificateValidationCallback in SslStream #77220
    NO-REVIEW, os-android
  • Lazily instantiate JsonSerializerOptions.Converters #77219
    area-System.Text.Json, 8.0.0
  • [wasm] few JS interop tests #77218
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0
  • [mono] Vector128 ConvertTo API's for Amd64 #77211
    area-Codegen-LLVM-mono
  • Simplify AppHost/ElfUtils #77208
    area-HostModel, community-contribution
  • [wasm] Template nits 2 #77205
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, 8.0.0
  • [ppc64le] Bug fixes - Backport #77202
    community-contribution
  • get rid of saved_allocated #77197
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Switch CoreCLR WeakReference to unified managed implementation #77196
    area-VM-coreclr

Merged

  • Add IR support for modeling multiple SSA definitions as one store #76139
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • Fold 'static readonly struct' to constants #77102
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [PERF][MAUI] Update Nuget.config branch for Maui workload install net7.0 #77231
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • [release/6.0] Build a new Microsoft.Windows.Compatibility OOB package version #77194
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [JIT] ARM64 - Do not allow move and shifting with MSL on 16-bit vectors #77123
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [ppc64le] Fixed FSharp crash issue #77201
    area-VM-meta-mono, community-contribution
  • Fix regression when serializing untyped polymorphic root-level custom converters. #77186
    area-System.Text.Json, 8.0.0
  • [wasm][debugger] Remove `JToken` properties that are for internal use only #75958
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono, 7.0.0
  • [mono][sgen] Fix detection of weakref objects #77170
    area-GC-mono
  • Add missing docs for `M.E.Configuration.Xml` #77188
    area-Extensions-Configuration
  • JIT: avoid LCL_FLD stress for locals that already have LCL_FLD appear… #77082
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Use DOTNET_ variables in tests #76997
    area-Infrastructure, community-contribution

Updated

  • Adds `ActivatorUtilities.CreateFactory<T>` API #77185
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-DependencyInjection
  • Fixes issue when monitoring a process launched via the same command line #76965
    area-System.Diagnostics.Tracing
  • Update .vsconfig file #77189
    documentation, area-Meta, 8.0.0
  • Add new version of the ContentionStart event #72627
    area-Tracing-coreclr, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • JIT: implement tail merging #77103
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • statically linking GC PAL on linux #76985
    area-GC-coreclr
  • [wasm][debugger] Fix failing `EvaluateBrowsableRootHidden` #77039
    area-Debugger-mono
  • [WIP] Support hot cold splitting in crossgen2 #74963
    NO-MERGE, area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Update assembly version from hardcoded to MajorVersion #74157
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, 8.0.0
  • [wasm] [debugger] First version of multithreaded debugging #74820
    area-Debugger-mono
  • Fix GCShadow for regions #77011
    area-GC-coreclr
  • JIT: Clean up inliner substitution #77176
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasm] interp perf to dev tools #77171
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0
  • [JIT] X64 - Three instruction replacement sequence for multiply in certain cases #76981
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Support delegate GDV guards in loop cloning #75140
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Add cecil as a dependency of the runtime #77029
    NO-MERGE, area-Infrastructure
  • Move linker to runtime #77149
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, linkable-framework
  • JIT: introduce some SSA accounting and checking #77055
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • PGO: Add new tiers #70941
    area-VM-coreclr
  • [release/7.0] Don't generate a nearly empty file #77187
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • [wasm][debugger] Remove non-deterministic signals from debugger tests. #77038
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • SmtpClientTest Assertion Fail Fix #76361
    area-System.Net.Sockets
  • Target only net7.0 during source-build - Port of #75168 to main #77052
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Add explicit flushing to ProcessStartInfoTests #76610
    NO-MERGE, area-System.Diagnostics.Process
  • Trim file type bits from mode header #77151
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • Added snake and kebab naming policies to JSON serializer #69613
    area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Arm64: Add If conversion pass #73472
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • Fix unzipping 4GB+ zip files #77181
    area-System.IO.Compression
  • Prefer OutputRid over PackageRID for output artifacts. #76871
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, community-contribution
  • Outerloop fix for libraries #74468
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, no-recent-activity, needs-author-action
  • #76881 internal properties in GetRuntimeProperties are not shown #77169
  • Add missing tests for NamedPipes #72956
    area-System.IO, 8.0.0
  • [JIT] X64 - More replacement sequences for integer multiplication by a constant #77137
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasm] Fix support for debugging wasm debugger tests with VSCode #77148
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono, 8.0.0
  • EventListener: Add test for logging a null string in an EventSource #77172
    area-System.Diagnostics.Tracing, community-contribution
  • [release/7.0][wasm] Fix Wasm.Build.Tests with stable 7.0.0 #76939
    test-failure, NO-MERGE, arch-wasm, 7.0.x

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-10-19
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • [Green Threads] ThreadStatics are not integrated #2012

PullRequests

Merged

  • NativeAOT-LLVM: Merge commit '4f78607507f1d189633cc320f3841c845f4f4b7f' #2047
  • Add support for ThreadStatic variables to the green threads implementation #2048

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-10-19
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • dotnet tool install should implicitly do dotnet tool update #28664
  • When compiling the dotnet/sdk project the ASPNetCore version doesn't match the cloned code #28663
  • `dotnet publish` updates `project.deps.json` for a project with a `PackageReference` with `PrivateAssets="All"` even when nothing has changed #28661

Closed

  • Workloads should be able to control the relative import order of .props and .targets #22358
    7.0.1xx
  • WorkloadManifest.targets should be imported in a pre-determined order for `7.0` #28607
    7.0.0
  • APICompat.Task targets file should be validated in CI #28300
  • PackageValidation enqueues work items for strict mode true and false #25853
  • ApiCompatibility Symbol filtering story is incomplete #16920
    7.0.1xx
  • dotnet test does not find any tests if environment variable is set that ends with dll #28592
  • dotnet build fails without any warning or error #28226

PullRequests

Created

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.1xx' => 'release/7.0.2xx' #28668
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.2xx' => 'main' #28667
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.4xx' => 'release/7.0.1xx' #28666
    Area-Infrastructure

Merged

  • Fix typo in tab-completion.md #28636
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Run less tests per Helix Proc to Increase Pipeline Performance #28623
    Infrastructure
  • Return workload manifests in defined, controllable order #28627
    Servicing-approved, Area-Workloads, 7.0.0
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 2025250 #28658
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.2xx' => 'main' #28650
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Fix parsing for arguments ending with dll/exe #28662
    Area-DotNet Test
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.1xx' => 'release/7.0.2xx' #28648
    Area-Infrastructure

Updated

  • Update arcade dependency to pick up new pools and build images #28641
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Allow Implicit RID Opt Out + Don't Infer RID for non EXE Type Projects #28628
    Bug, Servicing-consider
  • Add PackageDependenciesDesignTime to cache assets file #28405
  • Adding some loc locked tags #28553
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.1xx' => 'release/6.0.3xx' #28643
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Update the sdk build to target net8.0 #28563
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Ensure workload installers can be read by other users #28608
    Area-Workloads
  • Make all public API in dotnet-watch.dll internal and sealed. #28260
    feature-dotnetwatch, Area-Watch

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-10-19
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • CS8785 ForAttributeWithMetadataName issue with source generator #64841
  • Move VS4Mac off of SolutionCrawler #64839
  • Analyzer consistency check should not consider MVID on .NET Core #64826
    17.5
  • IDE0004 false positive when casting int litral to nint and trying to assign to IntPtr #64825
  • Support multiple language classifiers in ASP.NET Core #64822
  • Offer more autocomplete options when accessibility modifiers don't match. #64821

Closed

  • Test plan for Utf8StringLiterals feature. #58848
    17.4
  • Async taggers must override equality checks when comparing tags. #64797

PullRequests

Created

  • Disable sqlite service on full disk #64844
    Area-IDE
  • Fix color contrast for highlighted item #64843
    Area-IDE, UX Review Not Required
  • Validate RPS regression #64842
    Area-IDE
  • Update NuGet version to run MSBuildWorkspace tests against .NET SDK #64840
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Update 17.4 PreReleaseVersionLabel to 5 for preview 5 #64838
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Remove net50 ref assemblies #64833
    Area-Compilers
  • Fix analyzer consistency checks #64831
    Area-Compilers, 17.5
  • Ensure .NET Core MSBuild Workspace tests actually run in PR validation #64830
    Area-IDE
  • Copy caller info and nullability attributes from lambdas #64823
    Area-Compilers
  • Allow ref initializers for ref fields #64817
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Ref Fields

Merged

  • Merge release/dev17.2 to release/dev17.3 #64835
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Fix Color Contrast For STE Close Button #64834
    Area-IDE, UX Review Not Required, Next
  • Snippets - turn on by default in 17.5 #64829
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #64837
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.4 to main #64836
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts, Next
  • Update 17.4 PreReleaseVersionLabel to 4 for preview 4 #64832
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Implement equality semantics for async tagger tags. #64802
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Use IAsyncEnumerable in DesignerAttributeScanning as well. #64616
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #64828
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.4 to main #64815
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.0-vs-deps to release/dev17.2 #64827
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #64820
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Additional tests for UTF-8 string literals feature #64824
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Utf8StringLiterals, Next
  • Merge release/dev16.11-vs-deps to release/dev17.0-vs-deps #64819
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Revert "Read required project properties from evaluation data" #64801
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Encoding serialization #64625
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Export correct type for VisualStudioWorkpacePartialSolutionsTestHook.cs #64799
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Stay on the UI thread if it's blocked waiting for us #64813
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #64816
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Move parts of official build onto new vm images #64805
    Area-Infrastructure

Updated

  • Disable Windows PDB conversion #64581
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #64848
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge release/dev17.3 to release/dev17.4 #64847
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge release/dev17.0-vs-deps to release/dev17.2 #64846
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge release/dev16.11-vs-deps to release/dev17.0-vs-deps #64845
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts
  • Remove support for recoverable syntax trees #64739
    Area-IDE
  • Solution services cleanup #64160
    Area-IDE
  • Use a more consistent pattern for updating the solution in a WOrkspace #64644
    Area-IDE
  • Semantic snippets - updates option names #64814
    Area-IDE
  • Use ParsedDocument in more commmand handlers #63579
    Area-IDE
  • TextLoader method override detection #64192
    Area-IDE
  • Clarify diagnostic when constant pattern has non-constant conversion to input type #64741
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • add telemetry log overload #64803
    Area-IDE

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-10-19
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • .Net 7 Razor Class Library Localization #44655
  • Debugging in visual studio creates interference with authenticationservice.js #44652
  • RC2 has different behavior using developer certificates compared to RC1 and earlier #44651
  • System.IO.IOException: 'Received an unexpected EOF or 0 bytes from the transport stream.' #44650
  • HPackDecoder buffer resizes too large #44643
    7.0.x
  • RewriteMiddleware sets endpoint in pipeline before routing middleware #44639
    .NET 8 Planning
  • [Spa] Spa proxy enhancements #44638
    .NET 8 Planning
  • [Blazor] Update service-worker registration to prevent caching issues #44635
  • Blazor CSS-isolation :global #44634
  • Blazor Server app display different between F5 and Ctrl+F5 #44632
  • Peformance Issue with dotnet core webapi in micro service acrchitecture on Ubuntu Server #44640

Closed

  • Add stopPropagation to all events rather than just one #21438
    Backlog
  • Improve default Error page in the templates #20705
    Backlog
  • RemoteAttribute and submit button don't work together in first time #20645
    Backlog
  • Blazor file input click not working in firefox #20555
    Backlog
  • `bind` vs `bind-Value` Diagnostics Experience #20056
    Backlog
  • Provide a simple way to turn an existing app into a PWA #19710
    Backlog
  • Simple Blazor WASM app (from File - New...) does not properly work in Electron - "Only 'http' and 'https' schemes are allowed" #19142
    Backlog
  • [Blazor] Provide redirect to login component in Microsoft.AspNetCore.Authorization #18979
    Backlog
  • Blazor Integrated Windows Authentication Roles do not work with long polling #17467
    Backlog
  • RCL template either supports MVC OR supports Components #17870
    Backlog
  • Allow FieldIdentifier to be passed to InputBase and ValidationMessage #16627
    Backlog
  • Inconsistent UI state after reconnect for app deployed to Azure App Service with Azure SignalR Service #13600
    Backlog
  • VS live unit testing is incompatible with .razor compilation #13549
    Backlog
  • Adding a format to input=time causes issues #13322
    Backlog
  • ViewComponents with parameters that collide with keywords #11868
    Backlog
  • Blazor default templates have nav render issues #7206
    Backlog
  • AnchorTagHelper: automatically add active class #7049
    Backlog
  • Button's onclick triggered upon right mouse click #5583
    Backlog
  • In RazorCompiler, coalesce adjacent markup blocks #5549
    Backlog
  • CreateSanitizedId should change to reflect HTML5 latest spec #4894
    Backlog
  • Local storage backed component state #5480
    Backlog
  • Handle scenario where an event handler was specified as the wrong type #5473
    Backlog
  • Don't support async void as page handlers in razor pages #4845
    Backlog
  • TextAreaTagHelper ignores default value within textarea tags #4824
    Backlog
  • Blazor: Separate Validate/StateChange concerns in EditContext #13595
    Backlog
  • Add _Imports.razor item template #13450
    Backlog
  • .Net 7 RC2 .resx code generation #44648
  • Can't deploy .Net 7 RC 2 to IIS (Win 2016) #44646
  • Update rebranding instructions to include steps for updating template precedence values #44481
    8.0-MQ
  • Can we improve chained-bind cases #13408
    Backlog
  • Blazor: Exception 'RemoteUriHelper' has not been initialized when using AuthenticationStateProvider server-side #11867
    Backlog
  • Never ending request when there are two razor components with same name #11263
    Backlog
  • Polly on Blazor #10652
    Backlog
  • Option to have area views without an areas folder #44223
  • Server-side Blazor + more SignalR #10475
    Backlog
  • Perf regression: endpoint, plaintext_actix, plainTextNoParamsEmptyFilter #44572
  • Passing object as parameter to component fails with implicit operator #5632
    Backlog
  • Higher-level pattern for async data loading #5628
    Backlog
  • Support for an element extension mechanism #5600
    Backlog
  • Sidebar auto-collapses any collapsable children on wide media - fix included #5590
    Backlog
  • Azure AD Authentication Error with Blazor wasm #38082
    7.0-rc2
  • Microsoft/signalr 6.0.4 transitive package eventsource-node 1.1.0 have known vulnerability security issue #44633
  • .NET 6 - Angular: ng serve not running until requesting page #39314
    Backlog
  • Blazor Webassembly (standalone) does not work with v2.0 endpoints #35794
    Backlog
  • Coding Standards: naming private variable members #40951
  • Is HTML5-validation supported? #20717
    Backlog
  • .NET 5 Blazor WebAssembly SPA Microsoft login error #28150
    Backlog
  • Add support for storing Encryption keys in Cosmos Db #44590
    Discussions
  • Blazor WASM Redirection after Authenticating #44264
    7.0.0
  • Blazor WASM PWA integrity errors after upgrading from .NET Core 3.1 to .NET 6. #39252
    8.0-MQ
  • [Blazor WebAssembly] MS Graph Authentication Issue #26655
    Backlog
  • SignalR client base on console cannot receive message from server #44617

PullRequests

Created

  • [8.0] Limit the hpack buffer resize #44643 #44654
    area-runtime, 8.0-preview1
  • Initial Form-binding support #44653
    feature-minimal-actions, area-web-frameworks
  • Produce arch-specific ANCM redist packages #44647
    area-infrastructure
  • [6.0] Limit the hpack buffer resize #44645
    Servicing-consider, area-runtime, 6.0.x
  • [7.0] Limit the hpack buffer resize #44644
    Servicing-consider, area-runtime, 7.0.x

    community-contribution, area-web-frameworks

Merged

  • Add steps for updating template precedence values #44642
    8.0-preview1
  • Add AdditionalDotNetPackageFeed for helix #44604
    area-infrastructure, 8.0-preview1

Updated

  • StringUtilities with xplat-intrinsics (and a little perf-tuning) #44040
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • Fix invalid redirection after 2FA sign-in (#44395) #44435
    area-identity, community-contribution
  • Introduce per-HealthCheckRegistration parameters #42646
    community-contribution, area-web-frameworks
  • Remove some `GCHandle`s from `SendHeaders()` #44561
    Perf, area-runtime, servers-httpsys
  • Update SDK #44601
    area-infrastructure
  • #42806 removing +1 from previous reconnection attempts #44611
    area-signalr, community-contribution
  • Unskip Playwright BlazorTemplates.Tests & Run on Helix #42266
    area-mvc, feature-templates, playwright 🎭, 8.0-MQ
  • Added configureConnection delegate to CircuitStartOptions #44623
    area-blazor
  • [release/7.0] Fixing XML documentation #44523
    Servicing-consider
  • Route tooling: Add framework route parameter completion #42910
    area-infrastructure, area-web-frameworks
  • Add analyzer and code fix to recommend against IHeaderDictionary.Add #44463
    area-runtime, community-contribution

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-10-19
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Multibindings applied to BindableObject.BindingContext property do not work. #10792
  • [Android] Animation lag when we use framework translate to method. #10789
  • Is there a way to change Shell.TitleView Background color? #10788
  • [Bug] Scroll view inside the stack layout not scrolling. #10787
  • ScrollView inside StackLayout is not scrolling #10786
  • Path does not respect width and height #10784
    Backlog
  • [Android] WindowOvelay painting is not working with shell #10781
  • [Blazor] Evaluate how we deal with the encoding in the URLs we receive #10780
    .NET 8 Planning
  • WebView not displaying in iOS app #10777
  • Java.Lang.IllegalStateException: 'View with id -1: crc640ec207abc449b2ca.ShellPageContainer#onMeasure() did not set the measured dimension by calling setMeasuredDimension()' #10776
  • android target platform identifier is not recognized #10773
  • Cannot update WebView2 UserDataFolder in BlazorWebView for Windows Forms #10772

Closed

  • New MAUI Blazor project should not target IOS by default #10766
  • [iOS] White flashy background after splash screen in MAUI Blazor #10767
  • MAUI Blazor Microsoft.AspNetCore.Components.WebView.Maui Dependency version error #10775
  • [Android] Multiple navigation bars appear for FlyoutPage (MAUI ver. 6.0.541) #10634
  • Changing properties on MauiIcon, MauiImage and MauiSplashScreen sometimes does not regenerate images #9803
    .NET 7 + Servicing

  • ControlTemplate breaks RadioButton functionality #10301

    7.0

    Backlog
  • Long Project Name breaks layout in new MAUI Blazor App #7231

Merged

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-10-19
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • How to configure temporal table with multiple owned entities in EF7? #29400
  • EF core change the datetime property of a object when saving #29399
  • Baffling query generation with .Include and multiple conditions #29398
  • "Execution strategy does not support..." when I do simple SELECT #29396
  • EF should warn or prevent users from seeding large amounts of model data #29395
  • multiple interceptor and ordering of execution #29392

Closed

  • ExecutionStrategy does not apply to Migrate() and various other functions #27450
    Backlog
  • Naming a migration "DateTimeOffset" doesn't work #25072
    Backlog
  • Static entities and cannot be tracked because another instance with the key value '{Id: }' is already being tracked. #29332
  • SaveChanges Perf Improvements through detecting opportunity to bulk update/delete. #29397
  • Bulk updates/deletes: Support in-memory provider #29376
  • InvalidCastException on wrong property type in entity #29357
  • Is there a way to define a different order of inserting elements when Table-Per-Type is used? #29390
  • Take with Range couldn't be translated to SQL query #29381
  • LazyLoading not working #29372
  • Returns wrong count of a ICollection<T> with Include #29367
  • Lazy loading of Related Data with proxies: Query Asynchronously #29333
  • Compiled Models #29320
  • InvalidProgramException when using Z.EntityFramework.Extensions.EFCore library in Android and IOS #29336
  • The naming convention of custom foreign keys and shadow attributes conflicts. Types that can be null cannot be null during migration #29298
  • Best practice for entities synchronization and migration between multiple micro services which share entities #29293
  • Expose DbContext on DbSet<T> #1592
  • Entity splitting: allow specifying more facets on the fragments #28625
    Backlog
  • Query from IQueryable and Add Some Filter #29385
  • FromSqlRaw throws Exception when querying all objects that contain a certain string property in a json array column #29355
    7.0.0
  • SqlServer GraphDatabase #29393
  • "Build failed" error message without useful information #29394
  • Option to avoid attempting to insert duplicate rows #14464

PullRequests

Updated

  • Update file "getting and building the code.md" #29361

entry.title: dotnet/installer - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-10-19
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • dotnet-sdk-6.0.402-win-x64.exe - parameter lang wanted or fix system locale bug #14778

Updated

  • Installer text is cropped #14522
  • Automatic Updates of .NET 6 and .NET Core 3.1 leaving behind previous runtimes and SDKs #14793
  • Installer unable to build v7.0.100-rc.2.22477.23: missing NuGet packages #14784
  • Package version requested is not released on NuGet.org #14775
  • [ARM64] With NET7 RC1 installed, some files in the .exe installer and the .zip package are not identical #14279

PullRequests

Created

  • [release/6.0.1xx] Update source-build tarball CI to utilize faster build agents #14795
  • Enabled source-building with mono runtime on any architecture. #14792

Merged

  • [release/7.0.1xx] Update source-build tarball CI to utilize faster build agents #14794
  • [main] Update source-build tarball CI to utilize faster build agents #14796
  • [release/7.0.1xx] Add ARM platform support #14592
  • Update README.md in installer #14785

Updated

  • BundledVersions: update portable rid logic. #14647
  • Update DarcLib, change VMR source mappings back to `.json` #14788
  • Disable some tests that are failing because of a nuget issue on linux #14789
  • [WIP] Get source-build main building #14790
  • Eliminate portable runtime build. #14549
